page.title: 15Religion in Featherstone
page.content: Religion in this area is based upon the Christian faith.There are no mosques or synagogues so anyone of these different religions has to travel out of the area to practice. All but one of the churches are actually located in Featherstone.There is only one Roman Catholic Church, Saint Gerard's but there is a small chapel incorporated into Saint Wilfrid's school.There are two Church of England churches,All Saints Church which is in North Featherstone and St.Thomas' which is in Purston,both have church schools.There is also a Gospel Hall and a Methodist Church. St.Thomas' and the Methodist Church both have male and female uniformed organisations.The only place of worship not actually in Featherstone is the Chapel at Streethouse.There is a small convent in North Featherstone.
